data.news_body: In terms of Regulation 30 and 46 read with Clause 15 of Para A of Part A of Schedule III of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we hereby inform that the audio recording of the Conference Call with analysts and investors held today, to discuss Standalone and Consolidated Unaudited Financial Results of the Company for the quarter ended 30th June, 2023

data.caption: Outcome Of Board Meeting
data.news_body: Outcome of Meeting of Board of Director of the Company pursuant to Regulation 30 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015

data.caption: Submission Of Audited Standalone And Consolidated Financial Results Of The Company Pursuant To Regulation 33(3)(D) Of The SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 33(3)(d) of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we send herewith following duly taken on record by the Board of Directors of the Company:

1. Audited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results for the quarter and financial year ended 31st March, 2023.
2. Statutory Auditor's Report (Standalone and Consolidated)
3. Declaration of Unmodified opinion of the Statutory Auditor on Audit Report Audited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results ended on 31st March, 2023

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Investor Presentation
data.news_body: With reference to the captioned subject, we send herewith Presentation of the Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the Company for the quarter and nine month ended 31st December, 2022 pursuant to Regulation 30 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015.Please take the same on your record.

data.caption: Submission Of Unaudited Standalone And Consolidated Financial Results Along With Limited Review Report Pursuant To Regulation 33 Of The SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 For The Quarter And Nine Month Ended 31St December, 2022
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we send herewith following duly taken on record by the Board of Directors of the Company:

1. Statement of Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results for the quarter and nine month ended 31st December, 2022
2. Statutory Auditor's Limited Review Report on Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results for the quarter and nine month ended 31st December, 2022

Request you to take the same on your records

data.caption: Outcome Of Meeting Of Board Of Directors Of The Company
data.news_body: We would like to inform you that the Board of Directors at Meeting held today were considered, discuss and approved Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the Company for the Quarter and Half year ended on 30th Sept 2022

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Meeting Of Board Of Director And Submission Of Unaudited Standalone And Consolidated Financial Results Along With Limited Review Report For The Quarter Ended 30Th June, 2022
data.news_body:
We would like to inform you that the Board of Directors at its Meeting held on today were considered, discuss and approved Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the Company for the quarter ended 30th June, 2022.

we send herewith following duly taken on record by the Board of Directors of the Company:

data.caption: Submission Of Audited Standalone And Consolidated Financial Results Of The Company Pursuant To Regulation 33(3)(D) Of The SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 33(3)(d) of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we send herewith following duly taken on record by the Board of Directors of the Company:

1. Audited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results for the quarter and financial year ended 31st March, 2022.
2. Statutory Auditor's Report (Standalone and Consolidated)
3. Declaration of Unmodified opinion of the Statutory Auditor on Audit Report Audited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results ended on 31st March, 2022

The Meeting of Board of Director commenced at 12:00 Noon and concluded at 05:00 p.m.

Please take the same on your record.
